member.name: T:YourLastOptionsDialog.ExtrasOptionsFactoryExtender
member.summary: Extends the options factory to provide support for additional property types, in particular for and properties.

member.name: M:YourLastOptionsDialog.ExtrasOptionsFactoryExtender.DetermineTypesFor(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Type@,System.Type@)
member.summary: Determines the types that should be used for a given property. The extender should set types only if it is capable of handling the type of property. If the property should be handled by the existing , the extender is supposed to simply leave the passed in type references as-is.
member.param: The property the types need to be determined for.
Type of the option to use for the given property.
Type of the option attribute to use for the given property.

member.name: M:YourLastOptionsDialog.ExtrasOptionsFactoryExtender.SetCustomValues(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,YourLastOptionsDialog.ViewModels.Options.Option,YourLastOptionsDialog.Attributes.OptionAttribute,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the custom values of an option.
member.param: The property the option was created for.
The option that needs its custom values to be set.
The option attribute that was applied to the property, if available.
The instance the property value can be found on.

member.summary: Implements the interface to provide additional views for and instances.

member.summary: Creates a view for a given option instance.

member.returns: A framework element that is able to edit the given option.

member.summary: An option that represents a value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the wrapped underlying source.

member.summary: The maximum value allowed.

member.summary: The step used in the UI for the selector.

member.name: T:YourLastOptionsDialog.Attributes.OptionTimeSpanAttribute
member.summary: An option attribute that represents a option.

member.name: P:YourLastOptionsDialog.Attributes.OptionTimeSpanAttribute.Maximum
member.summary: The maximum value allowed. Has to be provided as "hh:mm:ss" or other compatible string formats.

member.name: P:YourLastOptionsDialog.Attributes.OptionTimeSpanAttribute.Step
member.summary: The step used in the UI for the selector. Has to be provided as "hh:mm:ss" or other compatible string formats.
